meanings.definition: A period of excessive indulgence in an activity, especially eating or drinking.
meanings.sent1: After the party, she went on binges and ate too much cake.
meanings.sent2: During the holidays, many people go on binges and enjoy festive meals.
meanings.sent3: He went on binges with the snacks at the movie night, eating popcorn non-stop.
meanings.sent4: Her binges on ice cream were like a sweet avalanche, unstoppable and delightful.
meanings.sent5: The binges on candy left a colorful trail of wrappers behind.

meanings.definition: A bout of excessive or uncontrolled behavior.
meanings.sent1: His binges of video gaming kept him up all night.
meanings.sent2: The shopping binges during sales season can lead to overspending.
meanings.sent3: Their binges of laughter echoed through the room, contagious and joyful.
meanings.sent4: The binges of rain flooded the streets, causing chaos and delays.
meanings.sent5: The binges of applause filled the theater, showing appreciation for the performance.
